targets.expr: sum(rate(request_store_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", service="$job", http_status=~"$http_status",http_method=~"$http_method" } [2m])) by ( http_status )

sum(rate(request_store_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", service='$job', http_status=~"$http_status",http_method=~"$http_method" } [2m]))  / sum(rate(request_store_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", service='$job', http_status=~"$http_status",http_method=~"$http_method" } [2m]))
kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{ namespace="$namespace", deployment="$job"   }
kube_deployment_status_replicas_unavailable{ namespace="$namespace", deployment="$job" }
sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{namespace="$namespace", job="$job", pod=~"$pod", area="heap"}) by (pod)
max(sum(jvm_memory_committed_bytes{namespace="$namespace", job="$job", pod=~"$pod", area="heap"}) by (pod))
max(sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{namespace="$namespace", job="$job", pod=~"$pod", area="heap"}) by (pod))

panels.description: If the CPU Usage is not shown, please check the query in the panel "CPU Usage" in the dashboard "General/Kubernetes/Compute Resources/Pod" to see whether "sum_rate" is used instead of "sum_irate".  If it is the case, please update sum_irate in Query A in this panel to sum_rate.

targets.expr: max( cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests {namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})
max( cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits {namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})

panels.title: CPU usage

targets.expr: sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", container="crs-app", pod=~"$job.*"}[5m])) by (pod) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", container="crs-app", pod=~"$job.*"}[5m])) by (pod)
max(threadpool_maximum_pool_size{ namespace="$namespace", job="$job", pod=~"$pod", pool="Default_Executor" })
sum( threadpool_active_pool_size{ namespace="$namespace", job="$job", pod=~"$pod",pool="Default_Executor"} ) by ( pod )
sum( rate(java_logging_messages_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod" }[2m]) ) by ( level )
sum( rate(java_logging_messages_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", level=~"SEVERE|WARNING"}[2m]) ) by ( pod )
sum( rate(java_logging_messages_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", level="TRACE"}[2m]) ) by ( pod )

panels.title: Rate of Trace Messages by Pod

targets.expr: sum(rate(request_store_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", service='$job', resource=~"$resource", http_status=~"$http_status",http_method=~"$http_method" } [2m]))
sum(rate(request_store_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", service='$job', resource=~"$resource", http_status=~"$http_status",http_method=~"$http_method" } [2m])) by (http_status)
sum(rate(request_store_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", service='$job', resource=~"$resource", http_status=~"$http_status",http_method=~"$http_method" } [2m])) by (resource)

sum(rate(request_store_seconds_sum{ namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$job.*", resource=~"$resource"} [2m]))  by (pod)  / sum(rate(request_store_seconds_count{ namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$job.*", resource=~"$resource"} [2m])) by (pod)

sum(rate(request_store_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$job.*", resource=~"$resource"} [2m])) by (resource)   / sum(rate(request_store_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace",  pod=~"$job.*", resource=~"$resource"} [2m])) by (resource)

sum(rate(request_store_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$job.*", resource=~"$resource"} [2m]))  by (resource) / sum(rate(request_store_seconds_count{ namespace=~"$namespace",  pod=~"$job.*", resource=~"$resource"} [2m])) by (resource)

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(request_store_seconds_bucket{ namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", service='$job', resource=~"$resource", http_status=~"$http_status",http_method=~"$http_method" }[2m])) by (resource,le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(request_store_seconds_bucket{ namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", service='$job', resource=~"$resource", http_status=~"$http_status",http_method=~"$http_method" }[2m])) by (resource,le))
sum(rate(request_store_status_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$job.*", resource=~"$resource", cache ="hit" }[2m]))  by ( resource) > 0
sum(rate(request_store_status_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$job.*", resource=~"$resource", cache ="miss" }[2m]))  by ( resource) > 0

sum(rate(request_store_status_total{ namespace=~"$namespace",  pod=~"$job.*", resource=~"$resource", cache ="hit" }[2m]))  by ( resource) / sum(rate(request_store_status_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$job.*", resource=~"$resource"}[2m]))  by ( resource)
